lines.text: This killer is going to strike again. I know the pattern. I've seen it a dozen times. If we handle this town with kid gloves on, there's going to be another funeral within a week.
Are there any real people in this town I wonder?
You know the population of Oakley Park? It's about 50,000. How many people have you met so far? A dozen?
What's the matter? Aren't I good enough for your crummy little club anymore?
